subject: Re: Evp Listener???---Radio Shack Parts
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Steve,

Oh... you'll know if it's working.  Just pass the coil near the TV or 
breaker box, or something putting out some energy you can't hear.
The device will pick it up loud-and-clear.

I also just converted another dgital recorder to a purely inductive 
recording device, and added it to my Little Book of Prototypes.
I placed a link index on the first page too, to make it easier to go 
right to any prototype page.
http://www.ufogeek.com/prototypes/

- Mike C.
